wikipedia_page.main: David John Chapman (born 21 August 1936) is a British middle-distance runner. He competed in the men's 3000 metres steeplechase at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He also represented England in the 3,000 metres steeplechase at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia.

response: *Dave Chapman (actor) (born 1973), English actor and television presenter
